headline: 2025-10-27 — Authors of the arXiv energy-systems paper define an interaction variable that represents instantaneous power in watts (W) and generalized reactive power in volt-ampere reactive (VAR).

2025-10-28 — The same arXiv paper specifies 2 concrete control implementations (Feedback Linearizing Control (FBLC) and Sliding Mode Control (SMC)) to implement the intermediate reactive power command to the lower-layer physical model.

2025-10-29 — The arXiv energy-systems paper demonstrates its approach using 1 illustrative RLC circuit with a controllable voltage source as a simplified representation of a controllable microgrid component.
2025-10-30 — Authors of an arXiv correction note publicly correct 1 'pretty serious mistake' in the 2007 Olfati-Saber/Fax/Murray paper, explicitly amending the original paper's statements.
